page.title: 14Shops in West Farnham
page.content: The main shopping areas are {West St and{Downing St.}There are also small precincts on {The Ridgeway}and in {Wrecclesham. We went into the main shopping area and asked 20 shoppers if the shops were open on{Sundays}would they shop then? 15 shoppers said yes and 5 said no. {Types of shops There are many different types of shops in West Farnham, ranging from a Department store and a supermarket to sweet shops like The Mandarin. Farnham is lucky to have such a wide range of shops.{Elphicks}is a large Department store in West St. It is a very popular shop selling clothes, textiles, toys, crockery,cosmetics and much more. There are a number of antique shops and electrical goods stores in the area.
